game.name: Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 평론가들의 극찬을 받았던 2D 액션 플랫포머인 Grapple Dog의 후속작에서 여러 차원을 넘나들며 몸을 흔들거나, 점프하거나, 폭발시키세요. 파블로와 루나로 팀을 맺고 액션이 가득한 세계들을 빠르게 통과하면서, 그들만의 특별한 방식으로 우주를 구하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Swing, jump, and blast through dimensions in the follow-up to the critically-acclaimed 2D action-platformer Grapple Dog. Zip between action-packed worlds as Pablo and Luna team up to save the cosmos in their own unique ways.

reviewHighlights.text: A solid 7/10 (affectionate) kinda game. Controls feel generally good, music is snappy, visuals readable and energetic. I appreciate that the plot is t...
Solid platformer, good variety of powerups and mechanics. Late game spikes in difficulty, but otherwise a great time.
